com.facebook.buck.step.fs

Class RepackZipEntriesStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.step.CompositeStep
      • com.facebook.buck.step.fs.RepackZipEntriesStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Step, Iterable<Step>

    public class RepackZipEntriesStep
extends CompositeStep
    A command that creates a copy of a ZIP archive, making sure that certain user-specified entries are packed with a certain compression level. Can be used, for instance, to force the resources.arsc file in an Android .apk to be compressed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RepackZipEntriesStep(String inputFile, String outputFile, ImmutableSet<String> entries)
      Creates a RepackZipEntriesStep.
      RepackZipEntriesStep(String inputFile, String outputFile, ImmutableSet<String> entries, int compressionLevel, File workingDirectory)
      Creates a RepackZipEntriesStep.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RepackZipEntriesStep

        public RepackZipEntriesStep(String inputFile,
                    String outputFile,
                    ImmutableSet<String> entries,
                    int compressionLevel,
                    @Nullable
                    File workingDirectory)
        Creates a RepackZipEntriesStep.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - input archive
        outputFile - destination archive
        entries - files to repack (e.g. ImmutableSet.of("resources.arsc"))
        compressionLevel - 0 to 9
        workingDirectory - where to extract entries before repacking. A temporary directory will be created if this is null.

      • RepackZipEntriesStep

        public RepackZipEntriesStep(String inputFile,
                    String outputFile,
                    ImmutableSet<String> entries)
        Creates a RepackZipEntriesStep. A temporary directory will be created and used to extract entries. Entries will be packed with the maximum compression level.
        Parameters:
        inputFile - input archive
        outputFile - destination archive
        entries - files to repack (e.g. ImmutableSet.of("resources.arsc"))
